ModMetaData.name: Freefolk Ammunition - Single Use Grenades (Temp Beta)
ModMetaData.author: Freefolk
ModMetaData.description:
Single use grenades and throwable weapons as a stand alone, intended to be used with vanilla ammunition systems such as LTS Ammunition, Yayo's Combat, or Flake Wombat.
Created by Freefolk Modding Team. Powered by the Multi Verb Combat Framework from the Vanilla Expanded Framework
